channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Search & Replace
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Search & Replace

item.title: CVE-2024-4145|2024-08-01T20:33:52.569Z -- unknown -- search%20%26%20replace
item.description: The Search & Replace WordPress plugin before 3.2.2 does not sanitize and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, allowing admins to perform SQL injection attacks (such as within a multi-site network).

item.title: CVE-2024-4145|2024-06-13T06:00:02.892Z -- unknown -- search%20%26%20replace
